tweet: Here's the April Product Update for Cardano:  https://t.co/MPmaM3CZNx an hour of action packed information firehose!

NEW BLOG: Following the successful Byron reboot, we'll soon begin our phased transition to the #Shelley mainnet via a series of Haskell testnets. From a static, federated system to a dynamic, decentralized #Cardano... here's how we'll do it @Cardano  https://t.co/F0SgG3783I

#Cardano passed a third-party security audit. It is great news for all users and something that businesses and banks require.  Everybody will love to use #blockchain without vulnerabilities. It is a great competitive edge and a new #crypto standard.   https://t.co/nMiktFX1Rv

May 11th is the Friends & Family launch of the #Cardano Shelley Haskell testnet!  Cardano will be more #decentralized & higher throughput than #Bitcoin very soon!

Phase 2 (Rewards) of Cardano Ambassador Program is now live! Rewards will be made in our native token – ada (₳). This phase will further contribute towards driving the adoption of Cardano.  https://t.co/cnNz7RIQ5s #CardanoCommunity #ALLtogether  https://t.co/VXVI9xLAyP

#Bitcoin bull-run just began and transaction fees jumped to ~$1,60. The Bitcoin team had over 2 years to solve the problem, but it looks like we will overpay for transactions again. That's why I believe in innovation. #Cardano will have more stable fees as it scales better.  https://t.co/tB1wkvyiEo
